review: USELESS right out of the box. Won't connector to my network except 1 out of 20 tries. Customer Service sends me replacement. STILL won't connect. Then I'm talked to paying even more money for HDMI extension. STILL WONT WORK.  Then the Customer Service tells me I, yes me, needs to call my wireless router manufacturer to figure out why this product doesn't work. None of my other devices.....including Apple TV....have problem connection to my network.  No thanks returning everything, sticking to competitor's product.

review: I hate this thing.  It constantly drops our wifi connection.  Telling me to rearrange my house so the fire stick can be next to the router seems a little ridiculous to me.  Perhaps a software fix is needed.  Yes, when it is connected it says "excellent connection" so the router is not the problem.  Beware this thing still has a lot of issues.  Hopefully the 2nd generation will not have this issue.
